user_query: I want to analyze social media activity associated with specific stocks, specifically for tickers PLTR and BTC-USD on Twitter.

TaskList.description: Fetch total posts, comments, likes, and impressions for tickers PLTR and BTC-USD on Twitter within the past 30 minutes.
Fetch moving averages of posts, comments, likes, and impressions for tickers PLTR and BTC-USD on Twitter over the past 72 hours.
